Description: We are hiring for well- known Company (Road Design Engineer ) in Cairo :Delivering all aspects of roads and highways infrastructure assets including pavement designs, horizontal and vertical road alignments, drainage, signage, all types of at-grade and grade-separated junctions, and high-volume freeway grade separated interchanges.Preference will be given to candidates with experience in complementary infrastructure fields such traffic impact studies, structural engineering (for bridges and tunnels), geotechnical engineering, and stormwater management.Skills
Skills:
The candidate should have extensive experience of designing and delivering projects in the UAE.
Candidates should have a through technical knowledge of the required design criteria in the above disciplines, experience in applying these criteria in design projects, in particular road safety.
